title: Cold Hearted
overview: Being in love can make you feel like you're on top of the world. But what happens when that love turns cold as ice? Cold Hearted takes a look at romantic relationships that go horribly wrong. Each hour begins with a couple and the promise of a new romance, but somewhere down the road, it all goes astray. From lovers who find themselves at the wrong place at the wrong time, to stories of worst kind of betrayal, every relationship is ill-fated. These real-life accounts include obsessions, sultry affairs,and love triangles gone deadly -and they show how the love that consumes us can make us ruthless, manipulative and cold hearted...
